name: sync::atomic::atomic_umax

intrinsics::atomic_umax.doc:
Maximum with the current value using an unsigned comparison.
 `T` must be an unsigned integer type.

 The stabilized version of this intrinsic is available on the
 [`atomic`] unsigned integer types via the `fetch_max` method. For example, [`AtomicU32::fetch_max`].

doc: Updates `*dst` to the max value of `val` and the old value (unsigned comparison)
